member.name: M:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Text.ITextGenerator.GetFirstCharacterIndexInsidePage
member.summary: Returns the first character index inside the page, in case the text has an overflow mode set up and the text is paginated.
member.example: If each page has 5 characters, and we're on page 2, then this method would return 5 as the starting index of the text.

member.name: M:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Text.ITextGenerator.GetRenderedCharactersCountInsidePage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of characters that fit inside the page, in case the text has an overflow mode set up and the text is paginated. (otherwise simply returns the characters count)

member.name: T:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Text.MeshData
member.summary: Compact mesh representation for a single character (4 vertices). 64 bytes total: 48 (positions) + 16 (colors).

member.summary: Handles the very first character allowed to be visible in the text.

member.name: P:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.TextAnimator.MaxVisibleCharacters
member.summary: Handles the very last character allowed to be visible in the text.

member.name: P:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.TextAnimator.AllLettersShown
member.summary: true if the text is entirely visible, including waiting for appearance effects to finish (as they might still hide a character until the very end)
member.remarks: You can use this to check if all the letters have been shown.

member.name: P:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.TextAnimator.AnyLetterVisible
member.summary: true if any letter is still visible in the text
member.remarks: You can use this to check if the disappearance effects are still running.

member.summary: Status of an action's execution

member.summary: Action is still executing (typewriter will pause until Finished)

member.summary: Action has completed (typewriter will resume)

member.name: T:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.IActionState
member.summary: Runtime state for a typewriter action instance. Each action creates its own independent state when triggered.

member.summary: Updates the action state each frame.
member.param: Time elapsed since last frame
Current typing state (can be modified to change speed, etc.)
member.returns: Running to pause typewriter, Finished to resume

member.name: T:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.ITypewriterAction
member.summary: Factory for creating typewriter actions. Implement this in ScriptableObjects (Unity) or Resources (Godot) for data-driven actions. Pattern: Definition (this interface) creates independent States (IActionState) for each usage.

member.name: M:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.ITypewriterAction.CreateActionFrom(Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.ActionMarker,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new action state instance from parsed tag data. Called when typewriter encounters this action's tag in text.
member.param: Parsed action marker with parameters
Reference to typewriter component
member.returns: New independent state for this action instance

member.name: T:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.BuiltIn.SpeedActionState
member.summary: State for speed action - applies speed change immediately and finishes

member.name: T:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.BuiltIn.WaitForAction
member.summary: Typewriter action that pauses typing for a specified duration. Usage: <waitfor=1.5> (pauses for 1.5 seconds)

member.name: T:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.BuiltIn.WaitForActionState
member.summary: State for wait action - counts down time before finishing

member.name: T:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.DisappearanceOrientation
member.summary: Controls the orientation/direction of text disappearance

member.name: F:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.DisappearanceOrientation.SameAsTypewriter
member.summary: Linear left to right (or right to left based on the text's direction)

member.name: F:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.DisappearanceOrientation.Inverted
member.summary: Opposite direction of the typewriter

member.name: F:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.DisappearanceOrientation.Random
member.summary: Hides letters randomly from start to finish

member.name: M:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.MarkerBase.CompareTo(Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.MarkerBase)
member.summary: Checks if a marker is placed before another in text. PS. Checks for internal order, since when a letter is shown (character index) there might be multiple events happening

member.name: T:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.StartTypewriterMode
member.summary: Controls when the typewriter should automatically start/resume

member.name: F:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.StartTypewriterMode.FromScriptOnly
member.summary: Typewriter starts typing ONLY if you invoke "StartShowingText" from any of your script.

member.name: F:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.StartTypewriterMode.OnEnable
member.summary: Typewriter automatically starts/resumes when enabled

member.name: F:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.StartTypewriterMode.OnShowText
member.summary: Typewriter automatically starts once you call "ShowText" method

member.name: F:Febucci.TextAnimatorCore.Typing.StartTypewriterMode.AutomaticallyFromAllEvents
member.summary: Typewriter automatically starts from all events

member.summary: Called once the text is completely shown

member.summary: Called once the typewriter starts showing text

member.summary: Called once the typewriter has completed hiding all the letters

member.summary: Called once a character has been shown by the typewriter

member.summary: Called once the typewriter has started waiting for a character

member.summary: Called once the typewriter has finished waiting for a character

member.summary: Called once an event has been shown by the typewriter

member.summary: Sets the given text to the connected TextAnimator component. If enabled, it also starts showing letters dynamically.

member.summary: Skips the typewriter animation (if it's currently showing or hiding)

member.summary: Returns the index of the first character in the current page.

member.summary: Starts disappearing the text dynamically

member.summary: Updates the typewriter state.

member.summary: Holds any range where the typewriter should be skipped entirely and show the entire text. Only takes effect if you're using a TypewriterCore
member.remarks: This value is reset every time you set a new text, calculating the "notypewriter" tags in it
